summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Lighting Department; authorizing loans of not to exceed Twelve Million Dollars (412,000,000) from the Seattle First National Bank, The National Bank of Commerce, or Peoples National Bank at an interest rate not to exceed five percent per annum (5%) to be repaid by February 15, 1972 solely from the revenues of the municipal light and power system, or from the proceeds of municipal light and power revenue bonds.
